location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has partially obscured the signature and almost completely obscured the date.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a communication dated 13 January 1808, which implied some error on the part of the Resident.The dates of the surrounding correspondence suggest that the date of this letter lies between 16-18 March 1808.
